General.Name: SDCL EDGE Acquisition Corporation
General.Description: SDCL EDGE Acquisition Corporation does not have significant operations. The company focuses on effecting a merger, share exchange, asset acquisition, share purchase, reorganization, or similar business combination with one or more businesses or entities. It intends to pursue opportunities in the built environment and transport sectors. The company was incorporated in 2021 and is based in New York, New York.
